data.caption: Intimation Of Commencement Of Commercial Production
data.news_body: Pursuant to Reg. 30 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 we wish to inform you that the newly set up structural fabrication workshop of the Engineering Division (MICCO) of the Company has commenced its commercial production today.

data.caption: Communication Sent To Shareholders Holding Shares In Physical Mode For Updating Necessary Details With The RTA
data.news_body: Pursuant to Reg. 30 of SEBI(LODR) Regulations 2015 we wish to inform you that the Company has intimated the shareholders holding shares in physical mode to update necessary details with the RTA.

data.caption: Setting Up Of A New Structural Fabrication Workshop For The Engineering Dept. (MICCO) Of The Company.
data.news_body: The Board has approved the set up of a new structural fabrication workshop for MICCO division of the Company.

data.descriptor: Appointment of Company Secretary / Compliance Officer
data.caption: Appointment of Company Secretary and Compliance Officer
data.news_body: The Board has approved the appointment of Ms. Neha Singh as the Company Secretary and Compliance Officer of the Company w.e.f 12th August 2025.

data.caption: Shareholder Meeting / Postal Ballot-Scrutinizers Report
data.news_body: Pursuant to Reg 44(3) of SEBI LODR Regulations 2015 please find enclosed the voting details wrt to the 91st AGM held on 27th June 2025 along with the Scrutinizers Report.

data.caption: Shareholder Meeting / Postal Ballot-Outcome of AGM
data.news_body: Pursuant to Reg. 30 of SEBI LODR Regulations 2015 please find enclosed the summary of proceedings of the 91st AGM of the Company held on even date i.e. 27th June 2025.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: Pursuant to SEBI (PIT) Regulations 2015 and the Companys Code of Conduct for Prevention of Insider Trading the Trading Window for dealing in the securities of the Company for the designated persons (including their immediate relatives) shall remain closed from 1st July 2025 till 48 hours from the announcement to the stock exchanges the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the quarter (Q1) and three months ended 30th June 2025.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication
data.news_body: Pursuant to Reg. 30 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 please find enclosed the newspaper clipping of the advertisements made in the newspapers viz. Financial Express (English) and Ekdin (Bengali) in relation to the ensuing 91st AGM of the Company which is scheduled to be held on Friday 27th June 2025 at 10:00 A.M.

data.caption: Reg. 34 (1) Annual Report.
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 34 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 please find enclosed the Annual Report for the FY 2024-25 of the Company.

data.caption: Notice Of The 91St Annual General Meeting Of The Company Along With The Annual Report For The FY Ended 31St March 2025.
data.news_body: Pursuant to Reg. 30 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 we wish to inform you that the 91st AGM of the Company is scheduled to be held on Friday 27th June 2025 at 10:00 A.M.

data.caption: Update In Details Of KMP For Determining Materiality Of An Event Or Information
data.news_body: In light of the recent changes in the KMP of the Company due to the resignation of the Company Secretary and Compliance Officer please find enclosed the updated list of KMP for the purpose of determining materiality of an event or information under Reg. 30(5) of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Management
data.news_body: Pursuant to Reg. 30 read with Sub Para 7C of Para A of Part A of Schedule III of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 and in continuation to our intimation dated 25th April 2025 regarding the resignation of the Company Secretary and Compliance Officer of the Company we wish to inform you that Mr. Rajat Arora was relieved from his responsibilities as the Company Secretary and Compliance Officer of the Company w.e.f. the close of business hours on Wednesday 28th May 2025.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication
data.news_body: Pursuant to Reg. 30 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 please find enclosed the copies of the advertisement published on even date in the newspapers viz. "Financial Express" (English) and "Ekdin" (Bengali) intimating that the 91st AGM of the Company will be held on Friday 27th June 2025 at 10:00 a.m. through VC/OAVM facility and the relevant e-voting information.

data.caption: Compliances-Reg.24(A)-Annual Secretarial Compliance
data.news_body: Pursuant to Reg. 24A of SEBI(Listing Obligation and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we enclose herewith the the Annual Secretarial Compliance Report of the Company for the financial year ended 31st March 2025 issued by M/s. K.C. Dhanuka & Co. Practicing Company Secretaries.

data.caption: Appointment Of Cost Auditor
data.news_body: The Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held on even date has approved the appointment of M/s. B. Ray and Associates Cost Accountants as the Cost Accountant of the Company for the financial year ending on 31st March 2026.

data.caption: Appointment Of Internal Auditors For Various Divisions/Factory/Tea Garden/Unit/ Sites Of The Company
data.news_body: The Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held on even date has approved the appointment of Internal Auditors for various Divisions/Factory/Tea Garden/ Unit/ Sites of the Company for a period of 2 years ie. FY 2025-26 and 2026-27.

data.caption: Appointment Of Secretarial Auditor
data.news_body: The Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held on even date has approved the appointment M/s. K.C. Dhanuka & Co. Company Secretaries as the Secretarial Auditor of the Company for a period of 5 years subject to the approval of the members at the ensuing AGM.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Appointment of Statutory Auditor/s
data.news_body: The Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held on even date has approved the re-appointment of M/s. JKVS & Co. Chartered Accountants for a second term of 5 consecutive years subject to the approval of the member of the Company at the ensuing AGM.

data.caption: Payment Of Dividend To The 7.75% Cumulative Redeemable Preference Shareholders Of The Company
data.news_body: The Company has fixed 20th June 2025 as the record date for the purpose of determining the preference shareholders who are to receive dividend for the financial years 2016-17 and 2017-18.

data.caption: Recommendation And Payment Of Dividend On The 7.75% Cumulative Redeemable Preference Shares Of The Company
data.news_body: The Register of members and share transfer books of the Company shall remain closed from 21st June 2025 till 27th June 2025 (both days inclusive).

data.caption: Corporate Action-Board approves Dividend
data.news_body: The Board of Directors of the Company has recommended payment of dividend on the fully paid up 7.75% Cumulative Redeemable Preference Shares of the Company for the FY 2016-17 and 2017-18 subject to the approval of the members at the ensuing 91st AGM.

data.caption: Results
data.news_body: Outcome with Audited FS

data.caption: Results
data.news_body: Outcome with Audited FS

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On 9Th May 2025 Along With Audited Financial Results.
data.news_body: Outcome of Board Meeting held on 9th May 2025 along with Audited Financial Results.

data.caption: Corporate Action-Board to consider Dividend
data.news_body:
The meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on Friday 9th May 2025 to consider and recommend dividend if any for the financial year 2024-25 subject to the approval of the members of the Company at the ensuing 91st AGM on:
a) the fully paid up Equity (Ordinary) Shares of the Company; and/or
b) 7.75% Cumulative Redeemable Preference Shares of the Company.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Prior Intimation Of Board Meeting Scheduled To Be Held On Friday 9Th May 2025 In Compliance With  Regulation 29 Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015
data.news_body:
Gillanders Arbuthnot & Company Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 09/05/2025 inter alia to consider and approve In compliance with Regulation 29 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we wish to inform you that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company will be held at its Registered Office on Friday 9th May 2025 inter -alia to transact the following businesses:

i. To consider and approve the audited standalone and consolidated financial results of the Company for the quarter and financial year ended 31st March 2025 and Auditors Report thereon; and

ii. To consider and recommend dividend if any for the financial year 2024-25 subject to the approval of the members at the ensuing 91st Annual General Meeting of the Company on:
a) the fully paid up Equity (Ordinary) Shares of the Company; and/or
b) 7.75% Cumulative Redeemable Preference Shares of the Company.

data.descriptor: Resignation of Company Secretary / Compliance Officer
data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Resignation of Company Secretary / Compliance Officer
data.news_body:
In compliance with Regulation 30 read with Sub Para 7 and 7C of Para A of Part A of Schedule III of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 we hereby inform you that Mr. Rajat Arora Company Secretary and Compliance Officer of the Company has tendered his resignation to pursue an alternate career opportunity outside the Company and the same has been accepted by the Company. The effective date of resignation will be Wednesday 28th May 2025. 
The Company places on record its sincere appreciation for the diligent and dedicated services provided by Mr. Rajat Arora throughout his tenure as the Company Secretary and Compliance Officer of the Company and wishes him the very best for his future endeavours. 
Details as required pursuant to SEBI Circular dated 11th November 2024 are attached herwith along with the resignation letter.

data.descriptor: Certificate under Reg. 74 (5) of SEBI (DP) Regulations 2018
data.caption: Compliances-Certificate under Reg. 74 (5) of SEBI (DP) Regulations 2018
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 74(5) of SEBI(Depositories and Participants) Regulations 2018 please find enclosed the Compliance Certificate for the quarter (Q4) ended 31st March 2025 issued by M/s Maheshwari Datamatics Pvt. Ltd. Registrar and Share Transfer Agent of the Company.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body:
This is to inform you that pursuant to the provisions of SEBI (Prohibition Of Insider Trading)Regulations 2015 as amended from time to time and as per the Companys Code of Conduct for Prevention of Insider Trading the Trading Window for dealing in securities of the Company for the Designated Persons (including their immediate relatives) shall remain closed from 1st April 2025 till forty eight(48) hours from the announcement to the stock exchanges the Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the quarter (Q4) and financial year ended 31st March 2025.

Further the date of meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company to consider and approve the Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the said period will be intimated to you in due course.
